member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebSockets.Server.WebSocketOptions.KeepAliveInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the frequency at which to send Ping/Pong keep-alive control frames. The default is two minutes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebSockets.Server.WebSocketOptions.ReceiveBufferSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the protocol buffer used to receive and parse frames. The default is 4kb.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebSockets.Server.WebSocketOptions.ReplaceFeature
member.summary: Gets or sets if the middleware should replace the WebSocket implementation provided by a component earlier in the stack. This is false by default.
